name: Knights & Cards
description:
Description :

This game is a turn-based strategy game wich uses cards. It is a cartoon medieval style.

The game has two major phases :

  • A deployment phase : in this phase you have to deploy your troops while respecting the money and troops that are available. You must adapt to the ennemy units.
  • A combat phase : you must use cards to give orders to your units, some cards have defensive bonuses, others have a good movement range and some have offensive bonuses for example. Use the good card on the good unit at the right time is required to defeat the ennemy!

The game has currently five levels with an increasing difficulty.  Now, the goal is to destroy bandits near a small town.

This tactical game will test your skills! Enjoy and don't hesitate to give me a feedback!
